General.Name: Nila Spaces Limited
General.Description: Nila Spaces Limited engages in the real estate development activities. It undertakes residential and commercial real estate projects, as well as involved in the construction and development of buildings for sale and other real estate activities. The company was formerly known as Parmananday Superstructure Limited and changed its name to Nila Spaces Limited in November 2017. Nila Spaces Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Ahmedabad, India.
